duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all food meets high standards and is prepared in a fast-paced environment.
Thrive in an upbeat and fast-paced food service environment and work all shifts: opening, closing, and everything in between.
Prepare highest quality chicken finger meals for customers to enjoy.
Participate in promotional opportunities for career growth.
Take orders from Customers and process payments efficiently.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food.

education_certification.credential: No specific education or degree requirement
